item.title: Data Engineering Concepts
item.description: Some core concepts we are going to explore: Data Warehouse vs Data Lake vs Data Lakehouse Storage Layer vs Data Lake File Format vs Data Lake Table Format Modern Data Stack Metrics Layer ELT vs ETL MapReduce [[OLTP]] vs [[OLAP]] [[Data Modeling]] [[Batch processing]] vs [[Streaming Processing]] [[Indexing]] [[Relational Database]] vs [[NoSQL Database]]

item.title: Data Engineering Guides
item.description: Some Data Engineering Guides that will help you learn data engineering: Data Quality How to handle [[Data Quality]] issues by detecting, understanding, fixing, and reduce Data Lake / Lakehouse Guide The what & why of a Data Lake Differences between Lakehouse & Data Warehouse Components of a data lake Storage Layer Data Lake File Format Data Lake Table Format with Apache Parquet, Apache Iceberg, and Apache Hudi Trends in the market We answer questions such as: How to build an open-source data lake offloading data for analytics?
